answers.answer: The right to receive medical care is available for refugees from Ukraine.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Medical assistance for refugees from Ukraine Eligibility for health care and other useful information'.

answers.answer: The provided content describes various medical services available, but does not detail a general access process for all healthcare services for refugees from Ukraine.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: A family doctor provides services including information for patients with chronic diseases, preventive services, and home consultations, all part of a basic package of services.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Family doctor and a basic package of services'.

answers.answer: The provided content indicates that information on how to use the services of a family doctor is available within the relevant section.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Family doctor and a basic package of services'.

answers.answer: A list of free laboratories for refugees can be found under the section detailing laboratory analyses and imaging investigations.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Laboratory analyzes and imaging investigations'.

answers.answer: The rules for conducting medical examinations and servicing patients in laboratories are available within the section on laboratory analyses and imaging investigations.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Laboratory analyzes and imaging investigations'.

answers.answer: Information on where and how to obtain medical advice from a narrow specialist is available under the 'Specialist consultation' section.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Specialist consultation'.

answers.answer: The provided content mentions that a basic package of services is provided by a narrow specialist, but does not list the specific types of services included.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Specialist consultation'.

answers.answer: The section on hospitalization services in public and private institutions contains information regarding who pays for the treatment.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Hospitalization services in public and private institutions'.

answers.answer: The conditions for the provision of hospitalization services in public and private health care institutions are detailed within the relevant section.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Hospitalization services in public and private institutions'.

answers.answer: The cost of treatment for all categories of patients is available within the section on dentistry in Romania.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Dentistry in Romania: basic dental medicine package'.

answers.answer: The basic dental medicine package includes dentist consultation and treatment, with a complete list of services available in the relevant section.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Dentistry in Romania: basic dental medicine package'.

answers.answer: A list of procedures involved in physical medicine and rehabilitation services provided on an outpatient basis in health resorts is available in the relevant section.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Medical recovery, physical medicine and rehabilitation services'.

answers.answer: Medical recovery can be received through treatment in hospitals and sanatoriums, including medical services in physical medicine and rehabilitation.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Medical recovery in hospitals, sanatoriums'.

answers.answer: Information regarding which doctor can prescribe a compensated medicine is available within the section on medicines reimbursed by the Health Fund.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Medicines reimbursed by the Health Fund'.

answers.answer: Medicines covered by the Health Fund are detailed in the compensation lists available within the relevant section.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Medicines reimbursed by the Health Fund'.

answers.answer: The procedure for obtaining medical devices is outlined in the section dedicated to medical devices.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Medical devices'.

answers.answer: Medical services are provided for patients with Covid-19, including free treatment for insured, uninsured, and other people in Romania.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Information for patients with Covid-19'.

answers.answer: Medical services for pregnant women include primary care, observation of the normal course of pregnancy, and supervision of high-risk pregnancies.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Medical services for pregnant women'.

answers.answer: A Women's center provides assistance in accessing reproductive health services such as contraception, breastfeeding, prevention of sexually transmitted diseases, pregnancy monitoring, abortions, and services for victims of domestic violence.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Get help at a Women's center'.
